ProductInfo.Features:

<7> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <8> PD 67mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <9> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<10> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <13> LCD Screen Protectors
